auth.joinSubtitle: Join thousands of gift-givers spreading joy and happiness.
auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to continue your gifting journey.
auth.termsJoining: By joining you are agreeing to the Haady
auth.termsSigningIn: By signing in you are agreeing to the Haady
auth.verificationSent: We've sent a verification link to
auth.magicLinkSentTo: We've sent a magic link to
auth.clickLink: Click the link in your email to verify your account and complete your profile.
auth.clickLinkToSignIn: Click the link in your email to sign in. The link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.termsContinuing: By continuing you are agreeing to the Haady
auth.almostThere: You're almost there! Tell us a bit about yourself.
auth.birthdayHelper: Add your birthday. Help friends celebrate you!
auth.birthdayCountdownHelper: Finish setting up your profile so friends can send you gifts — no address needed
auth.profileComplete: Your profile is complete. Start spreading joy!
auth.phoneSubtitle: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code
auth.otpSubtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone
auth.checkEmailForOtp: Check your email for the verification code.
auth.otpExpired: This code has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.otpInvalid: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
auth.authErrorDescription: The link may have expired or is invalid. Please try signing in again.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
validation.fullNameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.phoneMinLength: Phone number must be at least 7 digits
validation.phoneMaxLength: Phone number must be at most 15 digits
validation.dateOfBirthFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future
validation.dateOfBirthTooYoung: You must be at least 13 years old
validation.dateOfBirthTooOld: Please enter a valid date of birth
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 4 characters
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be 30 characters or less
validation.usernameStartWithLetter: Username must start with a letter or number
validation.usernameEndWithLetter: Username must end with a letter or number
validation.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
validation.usernameConsecutiveChars: Cannot use consecutive underscores or hyphens

toast.checkEmail: Please check your email to verify your account.
toast.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
toast.checkEmailForLink: Check your email to sign in.
toast.checkEmailForOtp: Check your email for the verification code.

landing.heroTitle: Gifting, as easy as sending a message
landing.heroSubtitle: Send gifts to anyone by @username—no address needed. They privately pick where and when to receive it, so your surprise lands smoothly, safely, and right on time.
landing.heroSubtitleAlt: Haady turns gift-giving into a joy — one AI that knows your people, remembers occasions, and finds perfect presents.
landing.trustedBy: Trusted by thoughtful gift givers everywhere
landing.featuresTitle: Haady turns gifting into a superpower
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to give gifts that make people feel truly special
landing.feature1Desc: Get personalized gift suggestions based on personality, preferences, and occasions using our smart AI
landing.feature2Desc: Find the perfect gift that shows you truly understand and care about your loved ones
landing.feature3Desc: Quick setup, seamless experience, and instant gift ideas
landing.feature4Desc: Connect with friends and family to share gift lists and discover what they really want
landing.feature5Desc: Smart reminders for birthdays, anniversaries, and special occasions keep you always prepared
landing.feature6Desc: Explore handpicked gift collections for every occasion and personality
landing.useCasesSubtitle: From birthdays to business gifts, Haady has you covered
landing.privacyDesc: Haady is private by design. Your data stays yours. We never share your personal information, and you can delete everything anytime.
landing.learnPrivacy: Learn more about privacy in Haady
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of thoughtful gifters who make every present unforgettable
